 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סַנְסִנִּים‎</span> **noun [masculine] plural** ==fruit-stalk of date== ([[BDB#Löw|Löw]]<sup>p. 119</sup>) (Aramaic loan-word from <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> [[BDB#PS|PS]]<sup>2617</sup> ***racemus dactylorum***, compare Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***sissinnu***</u></abbr>, part of the date-palm [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>507</sup>); — suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֹחֲזָה בְּסַנְסִנָּ֑יו‎</span> [[Song.7.9|Song 7:9]].
